article_title: VIDEO: Jon Stewart on Jeb Bush’s Iraq Blunder: Is Learning From the Past a Disservice to Soldiers?
article_text:
The “Daily Show” host combs through every one of Jeb Bush’s answers to the simple question posed by Fox News’ Megyn Kelly: Knowing what we know now, would you have gone to Iraq? What he finds is both ridiculous and hilarious.

Stewart also uncovers the real reason that Bush won’t declare outright that he’s running for president. Hint: Money, money, money, money.

—Posted by Natasha Hakimi Zapata

Hint: Money, money, money, money.
The “Daily Show” host combs through every one of Jeb Bush’s answers to the simple question posed by Fox News’ Megyn Kelly: Knowing what we know now, would you have gone to Iraq?
Stewart also uncovers the real reason that Bush won’t declare outright that he’s running for president.
